pr_title: Issue #7752: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - NoFinalizer

timeline.message: Issue #7752: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - NoFinalizer
Issue #7752: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - NoFinalizer

timeline.bodyText:
one tests is never enough. At least two is required.
please add caseof finalizer in inne class - https://github.com/checkstyle/checkstyle/blob/master/src/it/resources/com/google/checkstyle/test/chapter6programpractice/rule64finalizers/InputNoFinalizeExtend.java#L45 and place 2 annotations on method.
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText:
case https://gaurabdg.github.io/checkstyle-tester-reports/NoFinalizer/diff/guava/index.html#A4
it shows that violation is placed to not on line with method name , but on first annotation of method (where METHOD_DEF is started) - it is Ok for now. We place violation on same line as before.

Ok, noted.
replies.author: gaurabdg
